reviewText: I found this trailer for the DVD via their website. It's a great DVD if you want to improve parts of your game that people do not understand. It's full of tips and motivation I wish I had in my high school hockey days. I understand the game better after watching, but be warned that it is not any on ice instruction. For those types of tips, I would recommend Hockey Player 50 Ways to Score More Goals Featuring Luc Robitaille or Hockey Player 50 Hockey Tips Featuring Brian Engblom or Robby Glantz's Secrets of Hockey Speed Vol. 1. There are a lot of NHL players, coaches, psychologists, olympians and Stanley Cup Champs.
For the money it was diappointing. It is more of an inspirational dvd versus any training tips.
